channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Folketinget
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Folketinget

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 9–14 September 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne: 25.1–30.5%
  • Dansk Folkeparti: 7.3–10.8%
  • Venstre: 19.4–24.5%
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne: 5.3–8.4%
  • Liberal Alliance: 1.8–3.7%
  • Alternativet: 1.9–3.9%
  • Radikale Venstre: 7.9–11.5%
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti: 6.3–9.6%
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti: 5.7–8.8%
  • Kristendemokraterne: 0.7–2.1%
  • Nye Borgerlige: 0.5–1.8%
  • Klaus Riskær Pedersen: 0.4–1.5%
  • Stram Kurs: 1.1–2.7%
